description:
Mervamon`s brother, Ignitemon, returns to the side of justice and joins Taiki`s team in the fight against Zamielmon. He reveals to Taiki that the secret to Zamielmon`s small, elusive size is DigiHoney, the power he steals from other Digimon. They then receive an invitation from Zamielmon to a theme park called Honey Park, and though they know it`s a trap, they go there with a plan to make Zamielmon bigger so they can fight him. However, Zamielmon grows much bigger than Taiki expected, and Xros Heart must send Shoutmon DX to face his giant new form!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Laughing Hunter! The Wood-spirit General Zamielmon
笑う狩人! 木精将軍ザミエールモン
